allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Apply glassmorphism styling and add static LightPillar background

- Add glassmorphism effect to all panel elements \(Card, StatsCard, KPICard, Input, Tabs, FilterBar, DataTable, ConfirmModal, QuickActions, UpcomingTasks, RecentActivities, RevenueChart, TasksChart, MemberList\)
- Add isStatic and staticTime props to LightPillar for performance-optimized single render
- Add static LightPillar background to Layout matching OnboardingLayout configuration
- Add cursor pointer to all clickable sidebar modules

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix UI improvements: header backdrop-blur, cursor-pointer, and TypeScript errors

- Fix header backdrop-blur by making it fixed position outside main element
- Fix breadcrumb left alignment by removing gap-4 from container
- Add cursor-pointer to buttons in AccountTypeSelect, ModuleSelection
- Redesign LeadCaptureWidget with glassmorphism and working mailto
- Fix unused variables in LinkPreview.tsx \(TypeScript error\)
- Update Breadcrumb colors for glassmorphism theme

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "e:/Demo-Dashboard" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add profile images to gym module pages

- Add 45 profile pictures \(pp-1 to pp-45\) for all people in the system
- Update MemberList, MemberDetail with member profile images
- Update TrainerList, TrainerDetail with trainer profile images
- Update Attendance page with member profile images in all sections
- Update PTSessions with member profile images in session list
- Use centralized profileImages utility for consistent image mapping

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "e:/Demo-Dashboard" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add module screenshots to Login page carousel

- Add 7 webp screenshots for module carousel \(dashboard, hr, crm, accounting, tasks, access, files\)
- Import screenshots from src/assets/screenshots/ for proper Vite bundling
- Use webp format for optimized file sizes

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "e:/Demo-Dashboard" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update module screenshots with optimized dimensions

- Replace all 7 module screenshots with properly sized images
- Screenshots optimized for Login page carousel container

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -Command "$files = Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter ''*.tsx''; foreach \($file in $files\) { $content = Get-Content $file.FullName -Raw; if \($content -match ''#12121a|#1e1e2e''\) { $content = $content -replace ''bg-\\[#12121a\\]'', ''bg-background-secondary''; $content = $content -replace ''border-\\[#1e1e2e\\]'', ''border-border-default''; Set-Content -Path $file.FullName -Value $content -NoNewline; Write-Host \(''Updated: '' + $file.Name\) } }")
